channel.title: Im Getting Hosted On a VPS Server.... How Much Ram & bandwidth do i need!
channel.description: ok i am looking to have around 50-100 players to play my server. how much ram and Bandwidth do i need to keep it form lagging? need answer fast im on phone with a hosting company

item.title: Im Getting Hosted On a VPS Server.... How Much Ram & bandwidth do i need!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There isn’t any complete server software capable of handling this many players most likely, so no matter what type of server you get it isn’t going to happen.

item.title: Im Getting Hosted On a VPS Server.... How Much Ram & bandwidth do i need!
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:10, topic:320151”]Bad idea to host from a laptop. They are not build for intensive use.
There was this guy once that did host a WoW server on his laptop, it turned into a toaster after a while.[/quote]

So thats why my toast tasted like plastic lol

Read full topic

item.title: Im Getting Hosted On a VPS Server.... How Much Ram & bandwidth do i need!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

1GB per 100 players. Im not sure how much kb/s a single player requires, but its probably 4 kb/s.

item.title: Im Getting Hosted On a VPS Server.... How Much Ram & bandwidth do i need!
item.dc:creator: @teken2 teken2
item.description:
@teken2 wrote:

You mean a VPS?

I’d say it depends on your server code how well and clean it is,

And for a no lag get something between a 2.5GHZ - 3.0GHz and 3gb ram.

Read full topic
